name: VIRUS
description: Pandemic Labs is THE pioneering SocialFi game studio revolutionizing the industry. We create massively viral social gaming experiences like Infected (explosive 1.4M players in season 1 alone) and Addicted (incredible 100K signups in just 10 hours). Even more groundbreaking games are launching soon. $VIRUS is the powerful utility token that captures massive attention and value across our entire gaming ecosystem and directly flows maximum rewards back to our thriving player community.
